<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dvorovoi](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1195)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Traditionally, the dvorovoi is seen as the domovoi's younger sibling and has charge of a peasant's yard and all the animals and tools within. Animals favored by the dvorovoi become healthy, strong, and obedient, while less-loved livestock are exhausted and miserable. Peasants with a resident dvorovoi make sure to formally introduce new livestock to the house spirit and placate the spirit by leaving meals in the shed. Dvorovoi loathe white-furred animals and chase away any all-white cows or horses, though they have no similar grudge against chickens.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Dvorovoi](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1195)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 137</row>

**Perception** +12; [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) within their entire bound yard

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +8, [Household Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +11, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** -1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Master of the Yard** A yard with a friendly dvorovoi is blessed, as the dvorovoi helps in the yard, milks cows, protects tools, and does a hundred other small tasks. A yard so blessed never suffers from random accidents such as fires, and any checks to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43), [Earn Income](/Actions.aspx?ID=23), [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=42), or [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=27) in the yard receive a +2 circumstance bonus. If the dvorovoi is unfriendly, such checks take a –2 circumstance penalty instead, as the domovoi causes trouble in the yard, scares cows, scatters tools, and otherwise makes life a misery. A dvorovoi must spend a week in a place before these benefits occur.

**Items**
pitchfork

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 44

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 5

**Shy** A dvorovoi is naturally [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) while within sight of their bound yard. The dvorovoi can become visible, or even selectively visible—allowing some people to see them.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pitchfork +12,
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 18
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) ([animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) only), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45) ([animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) only), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189)
- **2nd**
[Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) (at will)

</column>

name: Dvorovoi
